mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_comment WHERE post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY create_date ${sortType}
SELECT * FROM tbl_comment WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY comment_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_comment VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(comment_id),0)+1 FROM tbl_comment),#{postId},#{commentContent},#{userId},sysdate,0)
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_comment SET child_count = child_count+1 where comment_id = #{commentId}
